nodes.text: Red Ten was the callsign of the tenth member of Red Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this designation, and several beings went by the callsign.

The callsign was used by the Rebel Alliance's Theron Nett when he flew during the Battle of Yavin. R2-X2 was Red Ten's on-board astromech droid unit during the battle. Nett and his droid were killed in the assault against the Death Star. He was shot down by Darth Vader after Puck Naeco's death in the meridian trench while covering Garven Dreis during their attack run.
The pilot known as Beau flew as Red Ten in the Red Squadron assigned to the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Liberty in the months leading up to the Battle of Endor.
